banner.title: Pickups for Military of Ukraine help close the need!
banner.description: Together we will provide our protectors with reliable transportation.

about.title: About the project
about.description-one: Trucks4u is a volunteer project that works for those who protect us. We provide free delivery of pickup trucks and other vehicles to the Armed Forces of Ukraine - where they are needed most.
about.description-two: We are looking for reliable cars, checking their technical condition, processing the documents, and personally delivering them directly to combat units. Our goal is to provide Ukrainian defenders with wheels they can rely on.
about.description-three: This is only possible thanks to people who do not stand aside. All aid is transparent, every hryvnia is directed towards a specific machine for a specific unit. Together, we are approaching victory.

attainment.title: Our achievements
attainment.unit: The units have already received the equipment.

donate.title: Help us get closer to victory
donate.description-one: Fuel and spare parts - the things without which no pickup will go.
donate.description-two: Make your contribution to the reliability of equipment for defenders.
donate.description-three: Every donation is a mile towards victory.

one.title: Transparency
one.description: We publicly report on income and expenses on the website.

two.title: Focus
two.description: We respond quickly to requests and meet the needs of individual departments.

home.awards: Awards and recognition to the fund.

payment.title: Help repair and deliver vehicles for the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Every hryvnia brings us closer to victory. We are raising funds to repair vehicles for units performing combat missions on the front lines. Your contribution is a step towards the safety and success of our defenders.

support.title: Request for Car Delivery

email.label: Email address *
email.support-text: All communication with you will be conducted through email, so please provide a valid email address and check your spam. The result of your request review will be sent to the indicated email address.

support.name: Applicant's full name
support.auto: Brand and model of the car

success.title: Thank you for your inquiry! You will be contacted by us soon.

error.title: Oops... something went wrong.
error.subtitle: But we believe: even a small step back is a path towards a great cause.

partners.title: Become a partner
partners.description-one: Join as a partner - let's make changes together!
partners.description-two: Partnership is more than just support. It is a joint action for victory and good deeds.

form.personal-data: I agree to the processing of personal data.

payment.title: Support our mission
payment.subtitle: Make a contribution - every hryvnia counts.
